summary: Encapsulates a single example for a text‑normalization decoding dataset, storing written and spoken token lists, the input span boundaries, language, semiotic class, direction (forward or backward), and the surrounding left/right context of fixed size.
business_intent: Facilitate creation and handling of training and evaluation instances for forward (text‑to‑spoken) and backward (spoken‑to‑text) text normalization models.
